name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3rd Generation 5th Anniversary Live 「Square of Magic!」【#3期生5周年LIVE】 [ZoTCTkD5VBI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare performs 'Haru' on a stage with changing virtual environments, from a stone room to a forest path and finally a cloudy sky.
A transition sequence with artistic shots of shadows and a black screen leading into the next performance.
Shirogane Noel performs 'Bling-Bang-Bang-Born' in a vibrant, yellow-themed virtual space. The rest of Hololive Gen 3 (Pekora, Marine, Flare) joins her for the final chorus.
A short transition with a black screen before the final solo performance in this segment.
Houshou Marine begins her performance of 'Zenhoukou Bishoujo' in a dark room with heart-shaped spotlights.

subtitles.original: ...遠くまで
subtitles.english: ...far away.

subtitles.original: 降り雨　草をなびかせ
subtitles.english: Falling rain, making the grass sway.

subtitles.original: 羊雲　あれも春のせい
subtitles.english: Altocumulus clouds, those too are because of spring.

subtitles.original: 風のよう　胸に春のせ
subtitles.english: Like the wind, spring is in my heart.

subtitles.original: 春を待つ
subtitles.english: Waiting for spring.

subtitles.original: 晴れに晴れ　空よ咲け
subtitles.english: Clearer than clear, oh sky, bloom.

subtitles.original: 裂いて春のせい
subtitles.english: Ripping through, it's because of spring.

subtitles.original: 降り止めば　雨でさえ
subtitles.english: If it stops falling, even the rain...

subtitles.original: あなたを飾る春
subtitles.english: ...is spring that adorns you.

subtitles.original: 胸を打つ　音奏で
subtitles.english: Playing the sound that strikes the heart.

subtitles.original: 僕ら春風
subtitles.english: We are the spring breeze.

subtitles.original: 音に聞く　晴るの風
subtitles.english: Listening to the sound, the clear spring breeze.

subtitles.original: さあこの歌よ　凪げ！
subtitles.english: Now, let this song be calm!

subtitles.original: 晴れに晴れ　花よ咲け
subtitles.english: Clearer than clear, oh flowers, bloom.

subtitles.original: 咲いて春のせい
subtitles.english: Blooming, it's because of spring.

subtitles.original: あの雲も　越えて行け
subtitles.english: Go beyond even those clouds.

subtitles.original: 遠くまだ　遠くまで
subtitles.english: Farther yet, even farther away.

subtitles.original: 唯一無二のこの技で　荒らそう本邸
subtitles.english: With this one-and-only technique, I'll raid the main residence.

subtitles.original: 禁忌、禁術、明らかなもって　反則次元、この世のものではないです
subtitles.english: Taboos, forbidden arts, clearly a foul dimension, it's not of this world.

subtitles.original: 無理ゲー、それ聞いてないって　Ay、ライバル口を揃えて
subtitles.english: Impossible game, I didn't hear about that, Ay, rivals all saying in unison...

subtitles.original: Wow、ライバル口を揃えて　バグで、バグれ、認めねえぜって
subtitles.english: Wow, rivals all saying in unison, "It's a bug, it's glitchy, I won't accept it."

subtitles.original: マジで？これお前、生身で？
subtitles.english: Seriously? You're doing this in the flesh?

subtitles.original: 生身のまま、生身のまま、イェー、イェー、イェー
subtitles.english: Just as I am, in the flesh, yeah, yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
subtitles.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born.

subtitles.original: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
subtitles.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born.

subtitles.original: 実力を発揮し切る前に　相手の方がバックれてくらしい
subtitles.english: Before I can show my true power, it seems my opponents run away.

subtitles.original: 上がり切るハードル、ベリーハッピー　明快に断トツ的に快
subtitles.english: The hurdles keep rising, very happy, clearly and overwhelmingly pleasant.

subtitles.original: 相変わらず脱皮してる毎日　Bling, Bling, Bling
subtitles.english: I'm shedding my skin every day as usual, Bling, Bling, Bling.

subtitles.original: 他の何の光もいらない、お前、アイソーリー、アイシーシー
subtitles.english: I don't need any other light, you, I'm sorry, I see see.

subtitles.original: パッと見、出来ない事ばかりだけど　ベリーハッピー、あ、キレてる、呆れてる周り
subtitles.english: At first glance, it's all things I can't do, but very happy, ah, everyone's fed up.

subtitles.original: 恵まれてる家族、友達、ハッピー　もう反則的な立ち位置、俺に任しとけばいい
subtitles.english: Blessed with family and friends, happy, already a foul position, just leave it to me.

subtitles.original: 教科書に無い、問題集に無い　超抜なマジな今
subtitles.english: Not in textbooks, not in workbooks, a truly exceptional "now."

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡、答えちゃって　Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, give me the answer: Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah.

subtitles.original: 生身のまま行ける処まで　To the next, to the 1番上
subtitles.english: Going as far as I can in the flesh, to the next, to the very top.

subtitles.original: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
subtitles.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born.

subtitles.original: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
subtitles.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born.

subtitles.original: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
subtitles.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born.

subtitles.original: To the next, to the 1番上
subtitles.english: To the next, to the very top.

subtitles.original: Ey-day、俺のままで居るだけで超フレックス
subtitles.english: Every day, just being myself is super flex.

subtitles.original: Ey-day、誰も口を挟めない
subtitles.english: Every day, no one can butt in.

subtitles.original: Ey-day、俺のままで居るだけで超フレックス
subtitles.english: Every day, just being myself is super flex.

subtitles.original: Ey-day、誰も口を挟ませない
subtitles.english: Every day, I won't let anyone butt in.

subtitles.original: イェ、イェ、イェ、隠し切れない才能も余裕で、Bling, Bling
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah, even my undeniable talent is a breeze, Bling, Bling.

subtitles.original: この存在自体が文化財のノリで、Bling, Bling
subtitles.english: This existence itself is like a cultural asset, Bling, Bling.

subtitles.original: 後継者は居る、免許は無い、愛車は、Bling, Bling
subtitles.english: I have successors, no license, my favorite car is Bling, Bling.

subtitles.original: 全国各地揺らすエピック、このベロが、Bling, Bling
subtitles.english: An epic shaking the whole country, this tongue is Bling, Bling.

subtitles.original: パレットなら満タン、変幻自在生身の言霊
subtitles.english: Palette is full, phantasmagoric spiritual power of words in the flesh.

subtitles.original: 音楽、幸運、勝利の女神、今宵も三股、ブン、ブン、ブン
subtitles.english: Music, luck, goddess of victory, triple-timing tonight too, vroom, vroom, vroom.

subtitles.original: 漫画みたいな奴らとまんまで、やり合ってしまってる漫画
subtitles.english: Just like in a manga, fighting with guys like those in a manga.

subtitles.original: 圧倒的力、この頭と口から
subtitles.english: Overwhelming power, from this head and mouth.

subtitles.original: この身体タトゥーは入ってない、この面、傷も付いてない
subtitles.english: This body has no tattoos, this face has no scars.

subtitles.original: 繰り返しやらかしてくダメージが、いかつい年輪を刻む皺
subtitles.english: Repeated screw-ups become wrinkles that carve tough annual rings.

subtitles.original: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang,
subtitles.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang,

subtitles.original: 俺のまま Bling して Bang して Bang する為に降臨した日本
subtitles.english: I descended on Japan to Bling, Bang, and Bang as myself.

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡、答えちゃって　Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, give me the answer: Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah.

subtitles.english: Going as far as I can in the flesh, to the next, to the very top.
